text: Iceland sent people to compete at the 2018 Winter Paralympics in Pyeongchang, South Korea. Iceland sent one man to Pyeongchang. He competed in para-alpine skiing. == Team == Iceland sent one man to Pyeongchang. He competed in para- alpine skiing. The table below contains the list of members of people (called "Team Iceland") that will be participating in the 2018 Games. Team Iceland Name Sport Gender Classification Events ref Hilmar Snær Örvarsson para-alpine skiing male SW2 Slalom Giant slalom == References == Category:Nations at the 2018 Winter Paralympics Category:Sport in Iceland
title: Iceland at the 2018 Winter Paralympics
